mapper.insert: insert into account (mobile, password, nick_name, create_date) values (#{mobile}, #{password}, #{nick_name}, #{create_date})
mapper.select: select id from account where mobile = #{mobile} limit 1
select id, mobile, nick_name, create_date from account where mobile = #{mobile} and password = #{password} limit 1
mapper.update: update account set nick_name = #{nick_name} where id = #{id}
